Break Before

# Break Before

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                           | Support     |
| ------------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
break-before-auto
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-before-avoid
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-before-all
```        | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-before-avoid-page
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-before-page
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-before-left
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-before-right
```      | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
break-before-column
```     | 🌐 Web only |
